rev.comment: Reverted [[WP:AGF|good faith]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/HectaSelecta|HectaSelecta]]; Wait until an aquisition is actually made (if ever). just being in talks isn't encyclopedic. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
rev.diff:
Line 75: Line 75:
On 9 July 2007, Google announced that it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire enterprise messaging security and compliance company [[Postini]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.google.com/intl/en/press/pressrel/postini_20070709.html|title=Google to acquire Postini|publisher=Google (Press release)|accessdate=2007-07-18|date=9 July 2007}}</ref>

On 17 September 2008, Google announced that it was intrested in acquiring the [[Valve_Corporation|Valve Corporation]] and their content distribution platform [[Steam_(content_delivery)|Steam]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.theinquirer.net/gb/inquirer/news/2008/09/17/google-valve|title=Google in talks to acquire the Valve corporation.|publisher=Google (Press release)|accessdate=2007-07-18|date=9 July 2007}}</ref>
